code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import Bredcrumb from'src/components/core/Bredcrumb';import SearchField from'src/components/ecommerce/DefaultList/SearchField';import TableBody from'src/components/ecommerce/DefaultList/TableBody';import TableHeader from'src/components/ecommerce/DefaultList/TableHeader';import UpButton from'src/components/ecommerce/DefaultList/UpButton';import Pagination from'src/components/ecommerce/products/pagination';import{getBrands,deleteABrand,resetState}from'src/features/brand/brandSlice';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BrandList=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();useEffect(()=>{dispatch(resetState());dispatch(getBrands());},[]);const brandState=useSelector(state=>state.brands.brands);const deleteBrand=e=>{dispatch(deleteABrand(e));setTimeout(()=>{dispatch(getBrands());},100);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container-fluid",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Bredcrumb,{title:"Brand"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-12",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row mb-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SearchField,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UpButton,{buttonTitle:"Brand",route:"add-brand"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"table-responsive",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"table table-centered table-nowrap mb-0",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableHeader,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableBody,{dataState:brandState,sourceName:"brand",performAction:deleteBrand})]})}),brandState.length>10&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pagination,{})]})})})})]})});};export default BrandList;
